thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au | 2 of 22
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text:
Selling my property, which had been home for 60 years, was a daunting task.
My feelings of apprehension soon disappeared when I engaged David Mogford from the Ascot Vale office.
David's professionalism before, during and after the sale was extraordinary. All of my queries were explained simply and in a timely manner. David went that 'extra mile' to ensure that I felt comfortable with every decision. He was 'down to earth' and practical with his advice and recommendations.
I was very happy with the result that was achieved on auction day, which again was a testament to David's calibre as a Senior Property Consultant with Nelson Alexander.
Since that time, I have highly recommended David and will continue to do so in the future.
